title: Looking to trade a T202 Matty for a T202 Matty
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Looking to trade a T202 Matty for a T202 Matty
posts.post_content:
I currently have doubles on the T202 Meyers/Just Before the battle/Mathewson. I am looking to trade one of these for Fletcher/Just Before the battle/Mathewson

You can take your pick which one you prefer. they are about equal though. The bottom has a bit of staining on the front, the top has a bit of staining on the back

Thanks :)
